_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The qualities of the three types of foll: They’ve arrived at inevitability regarding the right path
They’ve arrived at the level of the good person
They’ve transcended the level of the bad person
They can’t do any deed which would make them be reborn in hell, the animal realm, or the ghost realm
They can’t die without realizing the fruit of stream-entry.
